sears_products

Class Result

  • java.lang.Object
    • sears_products.Result

  • public class Result
extends java.lang.Object
    Result object is built to receive the input HTML stream from searching sears.com products. The Result object extracts desired information about the search query results. Result.java is meant for use with Product.java and Assignment.java
    Author:
    Andrew Neville
    June 20th 2013
    See Also:
    Product, Assignment, Jsoup HTML parser

    • Method Detail

      • getData

        public void getData(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the HTML data from the InputStream and converts it to a String. Then generates a DOM Document structure using Jsoup to parse the HTML content.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - - InputStream HTML results from searching a website
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        Jsoup HTML parser

      • parseProductInfo

        private void parseProductInfo()
        Queries the Result object DOM structure for all the desired Product information (Title/Price/Vendor).
        See Also:
        Jsoup HTML parser

      • parseProductCount

        private void parseProductCount()
        Searches the result document for the ID of the element that contains the information about the number of search results found. Then uses regular expressions to parse that string for the total number of products.
        See Also:
        Jsoup HTML parser

      • getProductSet

        public java.util.Set<Product> getProductSet()
        Gets the Product results in the Result object.
        Returns:
        - Set of all Product objects in the Result
        See Also:
        Product

      • getProductInfo

        public java.lang.String getProductInfo()
        Gets all desired Product information from the DOM structure and stores the data in the Result object. If this method is called by the user more than once, and the Result object still contains the previous data, then this method will just return the string representation of the Product info without a repetitive query.
        Returns:
        - A String representation of all of the Products in the Result object Product set.

      • numResults

        public java.lang.String numResults()
        Gets the total number of products from the DOM structure. If this method is called by the user more than once, and the size field is already set, it will just return the Result objects size field without a repetitive query.
        Returns:
        - A String representation of the total number of Products in the Result objects Product set.

      • addResult

        private void addResult(java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String price,
             java.lang.String vendor)
        Adds a new Product result to the Result set
        Parameters:
        title - - Product title / name
        price - - Product price
        vendor - - Product vendor

      • clearResults

        public void clearResults()
        Removes all elements in the current Result set
